publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5666 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Aquaculture and Fisheries (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Aquaculture and Fisheries (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limit indicated, each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 and 2: 35 minutes Groups 3 and 4: 1 hour 5 minutes Groups 5, 6 and 7: 1 hour 20 minutes. Supported by: George Lyon*
